h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ hetu.m ^a^T5.0001^ea^ ^a^M4.0195^ea^ ^a^V4.0229^ea^ kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa. hetu.m kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa. hetu.m kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa. (3)

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ nahetu.m kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa. nahetu.m kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa. nahetu.m kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa. (3)

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ hetu.m kusala~nca nahetu.m kusala~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa ^a^V4.0230^ea^. hetu.m kusala~nca nahetu.m kusala~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati ^a^T5.0002^ea^ hetupaccayaa. hetu.m kusala~nca nahetu.m kusala~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa. (3)
[03] 4^b^.^eb^ hetu.m ^a^M4.0196^ea^ kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa (sa.mkhitta.m).

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa nava, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejaate nava, aasevane nava, kamme nava, aahaare nava, indriye nava, jhaane nava, magge nava, sampayutte nava, vippayutte nava, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa nava, vigate nava, avigate nava (anuloma.m).

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ hetu.m kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayaa. hetu.m kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayaa. hetu.m kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammaa uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayaa. (3)
[03] 7^b^.^eb^ nahetu.m kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayaa... tii.ni.
[03] hetu.m kusala~nca nahetu.m kusala~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayaa... tii.ni.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ hetu.m ^a^V4.0231^ea^ kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati napurejaatapaccayaa... nava... napacchaajaatapaccayaa... nava... naaasevanapaccayaa ^a^T5.0003^ea^... nava.
[03] 9^b^.^eb^ hetu.m kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayaa. (1)
[01] nahetu.m kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayaa. (1)
[03] hetu.m ^a^M4.0197^ea^ kusala~nca nahetu.m kusala~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayaa. (1)
[03] 10^b^.^eb^ hetu.m kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati navipaakapaccayaa... nava...pe0... navippayuttapaccayaa... nava.
[03] 11^b^.^eb^ naadhipatiyaa nava, napurejaate nava, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake nava, navippayutte nava (paccaniiya.m).
[01] hetupaccayaa naadhipatiyaa nava (sa.mkhitta.m, anuloma paccaniiya.m).
[01] naadhipatipaccayaa hetuyaa nava, aaramma.ne nava (sa.mkhitta.m, paccaniiyaanuloma.m).
[03] (sahajaatavaarampi paccayavaarampi nissayavaarampi sa.msa.t.thavaarampi sampayuttavaarampi pa.ticcavaarasadisaa vitthaaretabbaa.)

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ hetu ^a^V4.0232^ea^ kusalo dhammo hetussa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. hetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. hetu kusalo dhammo hetussa kusalassa ca nahetussa kusalassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 13^b^.^eb^ hetu kusalo dhammo hetussa kusalassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena ^a^T5.0004^ea^ paccayo... tii.ni.
[03] nahetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa kusalassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
[03] hetu ^a^M4.0198^ea^ kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammaa hetussa kusalassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
[03] 14^b^.^eb^ hetu kusalo dhammo hetussa kusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati... tii.ni.
[03] nahetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa kusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati... tii.ni.
[03] hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammaa hetussa kusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati... tii.ni.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ hetu ^a^V4.0233^ea^ kusalo dhammo hetussa kusalassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo... samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... nissayapaccayena paccayo.
[03] 16^b^.^eb^ hetu kusalo dhammo hetussa kusalassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo... tii.ni.
[03] nahetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa kusalassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo... tii.ni.

[03] hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammaa hetussa kusalassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo ^a^T5.0005^ea^, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo... tii.ni, aasevanapaccayena paccayo... nava.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ nahetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa kusalassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo. nahetu kusalo dhammo hetussa kusalassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo. nahetu kusalo dhammo hetussa kusalassa ca nahetussa kusalassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 18^b^.^eb^ nahetu ^a^M4.0199^ea^ kusalo dhammo nahetussa kusalassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
[03] 19^b^.^eb^ hetu kusalo dhammo hetussa kusalassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo... nava.
[03] 20^b^.^eb^ nahetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa kusalassa dhammassa jhaanapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
[03] 21^b^.^eb^ hetu ^a^V4.0234^ea^ kusalo dhammo hetussa kusalassa dhammassa maggapaccayena paccayo... nava.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, aasevane nava, kamme tii.ni, aahaare tii.ni, indriye nava, jhaane tii.ni, magge nava, sampayutte nava, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
[03] 23^b^.^eb^ hetu kusalo dhammo hetussa kusalassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena ^a^T5.0006^ea^ paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ nahetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa kusalassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. nahetu kusalo dhammo hetussa kusalassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. nahetu kusalo dhammo hetussa kusalassa ca nahetussa kusalassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ hetu ^a^M4.0200^ea^ kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammaa hetussa kusalassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni. (3)
[03] 26^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa nava, naaaramma.ne nava, naadhipatiyaa nava...pe0... noavigate nava (sa.mkhitta.m, paccaniiya.m).
[03] hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne tii.ni...pe0... nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni (sa.mkhitta.m, anulomapaccaniiya.m).
[03] nahetupaccayaa ^a^V4.0235^ea^ aaramma.ne nava...pe0... avigate nava (sa.mkhitta.m, paccaniiyaanuloma.m).
[03] (yathaa kusalattike pa~nhaavaarassa anulomampi paccaniiyampi anulomapaccaniiyampi paccaniiyaanulomampi ga.nita.m, eva.m ga.netabba.m.)

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ hetu.m ^a^T5.0007^ea^ akusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa. hetu.m akusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa. hetu.m akusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu akusalo ca nahetu akusalo ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa. (3)

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ nahetu.m akusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa. nahetu.m akusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa. nahetu.m akusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu akusalo ca nahetu akusalo ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa. (3)

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ hetu.m ^a^V4.0234^ea^ akusala~nca nahetu.m akusala~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa. hetu.m akusala~nca nahetu.m akusala~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa. hetu.m akusala~nca nahetu.m akusala~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu akusalo ca nahetu akusalo ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa. (3)
[03] 30^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^M4.0201^ea^ nava, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava...pe0... kamme nava, aahaare nava...pe0... avigate nava (sa.mkhitta.m, anuloma.m).

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa eka.m, naadhipatiyaa nava, napurejaate nava, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake nava, navippayutte nava (paccaniiya.m).
[01] hetupaccayaa naadhipatiyaa nava (sa.mkhitta.m, anulomapaccaniiya.m).
[03] nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne eka.m (sa.mkhitta.m, paccaniiyaanuloma.m).

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ hetu akusalo dhammo hetussa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. hetu akusalo ^a^V4.0237^ea^ dhammo nahetussa akusalassa ^a^M4.0202^ea^ dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. hetu akusalo dhammo hetussa akusalassa ca nahetussa akusalassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] hetu akusalo ca nahetu akusalo ca dhammaa hetussa akusalassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
[03] 36^b^.^eb^ hetu akusalo dhammo hetussa akusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati... tii.ni.
[01] nahetu akusalo dhammo nahetussa akusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati... tii.ni.
[03] hetu akusalo ca nahetu akusalo ca dhammaa hetussa akusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati... tii.ni...pe0....

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ nahetu akusalo dhammo nahetussa akusalassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo. nahetu akusalo dhammo hetussa akusalassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo. nahetu akusalo dhammo hetussa akusalassa ca nahetussa akusalassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 38^b^.^eb^ nahetu akusalo dhammo nahetussa akusalassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
[03] 39^b^.^eb^ nahetu ^a^V4.0238^ea^ akusalo dhammo nahetussa akusalassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
[03] 40^b^.^eb^ nahetu ^a^M4.0203^ea^ akusalo dhammo nahetussa akusalassa dhammassa jhaanapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni (sa.mkhitta.m).

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^T5.0010^ea^ tii.ni, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, aasevane nava, kamme tii.ni, aahaare tii.ni, indriye tii.ni, jhaane tii.ni, magge tii.ni, sampayutte nava, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
[03] 42^b^.^eb^ hetu akusalo dhammo hetussa akusalassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo (sa.mkhitta.m).
[03] 43^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa nava, naaaramma.ne nava, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava, nasahajaate nava, naa~n~nama~n~ne nava...pe0... noavigate nava (paccaniiya.m).
[01] hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne tii.ni (sa.mkhitta.m, anulomapaccaniiya.m).
[03] nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne nava (sa.mkhitta.m, paccaniiyaanuloma.m).

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ hetu.m ^a^V4.0239^ea^ abyaakata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu abyaakato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa. hetu.m abyaakata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu abyaakato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa. hetu.m abyaakata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca ^a^T5.0011^ea^ hetu abyaakato ca nahetu abyaakato ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa. (3)
[03] 45^b^.^eb^ nahetu.m ^a^M4.0204^ea^ abyaakata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu abyaakato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa... tii.ni.
[03] hetu.m abyaakata~nca nahetu.m abyaakata~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu abyaakato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa... tii.ni.
[03] 46^b^.^eb^ hetu.m abyaakata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu abyaakato dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa (sa.mkhitta.m).

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa nava, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejaate nava, aasevane nava, kamme nava, vipaake nava, aahaare nava, indriye nava, jhaane nava, magge nava, sampayutte nava, vippayutte nava, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa nava, vigate nava, avigate nava (anuloma.m).

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa eka.m, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare ^a^V4.0241^ea^ tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate nava, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake nava, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni (paccaniiya.m).

[01] nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne eka.m (sa.mkhitta.m, paccaniiyaanuloma.m).
[01] (sahajaatavaaropi paccayavaaropi nissayavaaropi sa.msa.t.thavaaropi sampayuttavaaropi pa.ticcavaarasadisaa vitthaaretabbaa.)

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ hetu ^a^T5.0013^ea^ abyaakato dhammo hetussa abyaakatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. hetu abyaakato dhammo nahetussa abyaakatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. hetu abyaakato dhammo hetussa abyaakatassa ca nahetussa abyaakatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ nahetu abyaakato dhammo nahetussa abyaakatassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo... jhaanapaccayena paccayo... maggapaccayena paccayo... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejaate tii.ni, pacchaajaate tii.ni, aasevane nava, kamme tii.ni, vipaake nava, aahaare tii.ni, indriye nava, jhaane tii.ni, magge nava, sampayutte nava, vippayutte pa~nca, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
